newsdesc: Apple demands EU scrap landmark digital rules; EU rejects Apple demand to scrap landmark tech rules; Apple calls for changes to anti-monopoly laws and says it may stop shipping to the EU; Intel is seeking an investment from Apple as part of its comeback bid; Apple admits some of its in-store chargers are scuffing the new iPhone 17 Pro, adding fuel to users' durability concerns; Apple addresses iPhone 17 Pro and Pro Max “scratchgate” concerns; Apple admits some of its in-store chargers are scuffing the new iPhone 17 Pro, adding fuel to users’ durability concerns; Apple unveils new Phone 17, upgraded AirPods and watch at annual launch; Apple develops a lightweight AI for protein folding prediction; Apple responds to iPhone 17 Pro scratch and durability concerns.
market_implications: Potential impact on EU market strategy and consumer perception.
